page.title: 03VILLAGE EVENTS,LEASINGHAM.
page.content: At our{school sports}there are lots of{racing}events which include running,skipping,etc... At the village{bonfire}refreshments are sold.There is a{guy competition and a{firework}display.The guy that won the competition goes on the bonfire first. At the{village gala}many events and stalls take place;some favourites are fancy dress and treasure hunt. Alot of people are involved in our village{Pantomine}.The men almost always play the{ladies}leading parts to make it funnier. At our{school fete}there are{22}stalls including:raffle,tombola and hoopla. The{Harvest Festival}is in September. Our{school}goes to church and we give gifts like{vegetables}and{fruit;}even a carrot is worth a lot.
